verses.verse: Blow<WH8628> the trumpet<WH7782> in Zion,<WH6726> and sound an alarm<WH7321> in my holy<WH6944> mountain!<WH2022> Let all the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land<WH776> tremble,<WH7264> for the day<WH3117> of Yahweh<WH3068> comes,<WH935> for it is close at hand:<WH7138>

A day<WH3117> of darkness<WH2822> and gloominess,<WH653> a day<WH3117> of clouds<WH6051> and thick darkness.<WH6205> As the dawn<WH7837> spreading<WH6566> on the mountains,<WH2022> a great<WH7227> and strong<WH6099> people;<WH5971> there has never<WH5769> been<WH1961> the like,<WH3254> neither will there be any more after<WH310> them,<WH8141> even to the years of many<WH1755> generations.<WH1755>

A fire<WH784> devours<WH398> before<WH6440> them,<WH310> and behind them,<WH3852> a flame burns.<WH3857> The land<WH776> is as the garden<WH1588> of Eden<WH5731> before<WH6440> them,<WH310> and behind them,<WH8077> a desolate wilderness.<WH4057> Yes,<WH6413> and no one has escaped them.
Their appearance<WH4758> is as the appearance<WH4758> of horses,<WH5483> and as horsemen,<WH6571> so do they run.<WH7323>

Like the noise<WH6963> of chariots<WH4818> on the tops<WH7218> of the mountains<WH2022> do they leap,<WH7540> like the noise<WH6963> of a flame<WH3851> of fire<WH784> that devours<WH398> the stubble,<WH7179> as a strong<WH6099> people<WH5971> set in battle<WH4421> array.<WH6186>
At their presence<WH6440> the peoples<WH5971> are in anguish.<WH2342> All faces<WH6440> have grown<WH6908> pale.<WH6289>

They run<WH7323> like mighty men.<WH1368> They climb<WH5927> the wall<WH2346> like warriors.<WH4421> <WH582> They each<WH376> march<WH3212> in his line,<WH1870> and they don't<WH5670> swerve off course.<WH734>
Neither does one<WH376> jostle<WH1766> another;<WH251> they march<WH3212> everyone<WH1397> in his path,<WH4546> and they burst<WH5307> through the defenses,<WH7973> and don't<WH1214> break ranks.
They rush<WH8264> on the city.<WH5892> They run<WH7323> on the wall.<WH2346> They climb up<WH5927> into the houses.<WH1004> They enter in<WH935> at the windows<WH2474> like thieves.<WH1590>

The earth<WH776> quakes<WH7264> before<WH6440> them.<WH8064> The heavens tremble.<WH7493> The sun<WH8121> and the moon<WH3394> are darkened,<WH6937> and the stars<WH3556> withdraw<WH622> their shining.<WH5051>

Yahweh<WH3068> thunders<WH5414> his voice<WH6963> before<WH6440> his army;<WH2428> for his forces<WH4264> are very<WH3966> great;<WH7227> for he is strong<WH6099> who obeys<WH6213> his command;<WH1697> for the day<WH3117> of Yahweh<WH3068> is great<WH1419> and very<WH3966> awesome,<WH3372> and who can endure it?<WH3557>
"Yet even now,<WH5002>" says Yahweh,<WH3068> "turn<WH7725> to me with all your heart,<WH3824> and with fasting,<WH6685> and with weeping,<WH1065> and with mourning.<WH4553>"

Tear<WH7167> your heart,<WH3824> and not your garments,<WH899> and turn<WH7725> to Yahweh,<WH3068> your God;<WH430> for he is gracious<WH2587> and merciful,<WH7349> slow<WH750> to anger,<WH639> and abundant<WH7227> in loving kindness,<WH2617> and relents<WH5162> from sending calamity.<WH7451>

Who knows?<WH3045> He may turn<WH7725> and relent,<WH7725> and leave<WH7604> a blessing<WH1293> behind<WH310> him,<WH4503> even a meal offering and a drink offering<WH5262> to Yahweh,<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
Blow<WH8628> the trumpet<WH7782> in Zion!<WH6726> Sanctify<WH6942> a fast.<WH6685> Call<WH7121> a solemn assembly.<WH6116>

Gather<WH622> the people.<WH5971> Sanctify<WH6942> the assembly.<WH6951> Assemble<WH6908> the elders.<WH2205> Gather<WH622> the children,<WH5768> and those who nurse<WH3243> from breasts.<WH7699> Let the bridegroom<WH2860> go forth<WH3318> from his room,<WH2315> and the bride<WH3618> out of her room.<WH2646>

Let the priests,<WH3548> the ministers<WH8334> of Yahweh,<WH3068> weep<WH1058> between the porch<WH197> and the altar,<WH4196> and let them say,<WH559> "Spare<WH2347> your people,<WH5971> Yahweh,<WH3068> and don't<WH5414> give your heritage<WH5159> to reproach,<WH2781> that the nations<WH1471> should rule over<WH4910> them.<WH559> Why should they say among the peoples,<WH5971> <WH430> 'Where is their God?'"
Then Yahweh<WH3068> was jealous<WH7065> for his land,<WH776> And had pity<WH2550> on his people.<WH5971>

Yahweh<WH3068> answered<WH6030> his people,<WH5971> <WH559> "Behold,<WH7971> I will send you grain,<WH1715> new wine,<WH8492> and oil,<WH3323> and you will be satisfied<WH7646> with them;<WH5414> and I will no more make you a reproach<WH2781> among the nations.<WH1471>

But I will remove the northern<WH6830> army far away<WH7368> from you,<WH5080> and will drive it into a barren<WH6723> and desolate<WH8077> land,<WH776> its front<WH6440> into the eastern<WH6931> sea,<WH3220> and its back<WH5490> into the western<WH314> sea;<WH3220> and its stench<WH889> will come up,<WH5927> and its bad smell<WH6709> will rise.<WH5927>" Surely he has done<WH6213> great things.<WH1431>
Land,<WH127> don't<WH3372> be afraid. Be glad<WH1523> and rejoice,<WH8055> for Yahweh<WH3068> has done<WH6213> great things.<WH1431>

Don't<WH3372> be afraid, you animals<WH929> of the field;<WH7704> for the pastures<WH4999> of the wilderness<WH4057> spring<WH1876> up,<WH6086> for the tree bears<WH5375> its fruit.<WH6529> The fig tree<WH8384> and the vine<WH1612> yield<WH5414> their strength.<WH2428>

"Be glad<WH1523> then,<WH1121> you children of Zion,<WH6726> and rejoice<WH8055> in Yahweh,<WH3068> your God;<WH430> for he gives<WH5414> you the former rain<WH4175> in just measure,<WH6666> and he causes the rain<WH1653> to come down<WH3381> for you,<WH4175> the former rain and the latter rain,<WH4456> as before.<WH7223>
The threshing floors<WH1637> will be full<WH4390> of wheat,<WH1250> and the vats<WH3342> will overflow<WH7783> with new wine<WH8492> and oil.<WH3323>

I will restore<WH7999> to you the years<WH8141> that the swarming locust<WH697> has eaten,<WH398> the great locust,<WH3218> the grasshopper,<WH2625> and the caterpillar,<WH1501> my great<WH1419> army,<WH2428> which I sent among you.<WH7971>

You will have plenty<WH398> to eat,<WH398> and be satisfied,<WH7646> and will praise<WH1984> the name<WH8034> of Yahweh,<WH3068> your God,<WH430> who has dealt<WH6213> wondrously<WH6381> with you;<WH5971> and my people will never<WH5769> again be disappointed.<WH954>

You will know<WH3045> that I am in the midst<WH7130> of Israel,<WH3478> and that I am Yahweh,<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and there is no one else;<WH5971> and my people will never<WH5769> again be disappointed.<WH954>

"It will happen afterward,<WH310> that I will pour out<WH8210> my Spirit<WH7307> on all flesh;<WH1320> and your sons<WH1121> and your daughters<WH1323> will prophesy.<WH5012> Your old men<WH2205> will dream<WH2492> dreams.<WH2472> Your young men<WH970> will see<WH7200> visions.<WH2384>
And also on the servants<WH5650> and on the handmaids<WH8198> in those days,<WH3117> I will pour out<WH8210> my Spirit.<WH7307>
I will show<WH5414> wonders<WH4159> in the heavens<WH8064> and in the earth:<WH776> blood,<WH1818> fire,<WH784> and pillars<WH8490> of smoke.<WH6227>

The sun<WH8121> will be turned<WH2015> into darkness,<WH2822> and the moon<WH3394> into blood,<WH1818> before<WH6440> the great<WH1419> and terrible<WH3372> day<WH3117> of Yahweh<WH3068> comes.<WH935>

It will happen that whoever will call<WH7121> on the name<WH8034> of Yahweh<WH3068> shall be saved;<WH4422> for in Mount<WH2022> Zion<WH6726> and in Jerusalem<WH3389> there will be those who escape,<WH6413> as Yahweh<WH3068> has said,<WH559> and among the remnant,<WH8300> those whom Yahweh<WH3068> calls.<WH7121>
